result.eng: The hall was named after Saint Patrick.
result.ga: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh Pádraig
result.orig: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh Pádraig
result.html: Ainmníodh an halla i ndiaidh Naomh PádraigThe hall was named after Saint Patrick.
result.ponchtml: Ainmníoḋ an halla i ndiaiḋ Naoṁ PádraigThe hall was named after Saint Patrick.

result.eng: The stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ga: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.orig: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.html: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidhThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ponchtml: Baineann na scéalta le saiġdiúirí a ṁaraítear agus na mná a ḟágtar ina ndiaiḋThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.

result.eng: The walk had warmed me up a little.
result.ga: Bhí an tsiúlóid i ndiaidh mé a théamh beagáinín
result.orig: Bhí an tsiúlóid i ndiaidh mé a théamh beagáinín
result.html: Bhí an tsiúlóid i ndiaidh mé a théamh beagáinínThe walk had warmed me up a little.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an tsiúlóid i ndiaiḋ mé a ṫéaṁ beagáinínThe walk had warmed me up a little.

result.eng: What dod you do after the meeting?
result.ga: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnithe
result.orig: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnithe
result.html: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaidh an chruinnitheWhat dod you do after the meeting?
result.ponchtml: Cad a rinne tú i ndiaiḋ an ċruinniṫeWhat dod you do after the meeting?

result.eng: She detained the children after school.
result.ga: Choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoile
result.orig: Choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoile
result.html: Choimeád sí na páistí i ndiaidh am scoileShe detained the children after school.
result.ponchtml: Ċoimeád sí na páistí i ndiaiḋ am scoileShe detained the children after school.

result.eng: She left him after she got her satisfaction from him.
result.ga: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as
result.orig: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint as
result.html: D'fhág sí é i ndiaidh di sásamh a bhaint asShe left him after she got her satisfaction from him.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág sí é i ndiaiḋ di sásaṁ a ḃaint asShe left him after she got her satisfaction from him.

result.eng: We do the same thing year after year.
result.ga: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.orig: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.html: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh blianaWe do the same thing year after year.
result.ponchtml: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaiḋ blianaWe do the same thing year after year.

result.eng: I'll see you at half past nine.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag leath i ndiaidh a naoi
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag leath i ndiaidh a naoi
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag leath i ndiaidh a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag leaṫ i ndiaiḋ a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.

result.eng: I'll see you at half past nine.
result.ga: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair i ndiaidh a naoi
result.orig: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair i ndiaidh a naoi
result.html: Feicfidh mé thú ag leathuair i ndiaidh a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ mé ṫú ag leaṫuair i ndiaiḋ a naoiI'll see you at half past nine.

result.eng: We can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ga: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.orig: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí ann
result.html: Is léir ó na rianta a d'fhág siad ina ndiaidh gur beirt a bhí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.
result.ponchtml: Is léir ó na rianta a d'ḟág siad ina ndiaiḋ gur beirt a ḃí annWe can see from the traces they left behind that there were two of them.

result.eng: Thousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.
result.ga: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéile
result.orig: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéile
result.html: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaidh bliana chun páirt a ghlacadh san fhéileThousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.
result.ponchtml: Tagann na mílte daoine bliain i ndiaiḋ bliana ċun páirt a ġlacaḋ san ḟéileThousands of people come year after year to take part in the festival.

result.ga: Tá sé ceathrú i ndiaidh a hocht
result.orig: Tá sé ceathrú i ndiaidh a hocht
result.html: Tá sé ceathrú i ndiaidh a hochtIt is quarter past eight.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ceaṫrú i ndiaiḋ a hoċtIt is quarter past eight.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar

result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaiḋ agus isteaċ leo san uisce fuarThey left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.

result.eng: Four weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ga: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.orig: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.html: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.

result.eng: Where he had slept the night.
result.ga: An áit a raibh sé i ndiaidh an oíche a chodladh

result.eng: A little while after it got dark...
